subject: Question
description_text:
Hi,

with Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback
what haptics do you get VAM pro or the standard one?


thanks in advance

Nicky

conversations.body_text: Hi nicky schonenberg,  Hello, the package that includes the VAM Pro and purchasing the VAM Pro separately are the same in terms of price and configuration. You can choose freely.Â
